## Description {#details}

===- <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoptimizationremarkemitter-h">MachineOptimizationRemarkEmitter.h</a> - Opt Diagnostics -&#42;- C++ -&#42;-—===//

Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions. See <a href="https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt">https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt</a> for license information. SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception

===------------------------------------------------------------------—===//

Optimization diagnostic interfaces for machine passes. It&#39;s packaged as an analysis pass so that by using this service passes become dependent on MBFI as well. MBFI is used to compute the &quot;hotness&quot; of the diagnostic message.

===------------------------------------------------------------------—===//

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The optimization diagnostic interface.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">/// It allows reporting when optimizations are performed and when they are not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">/// along with the reasons for it.  Hotness information of the corresponding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">/// code region can be included in the remark if DiagnosticsHotnessRequested is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">/// enabled in the LLVM context.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoptimizationremarkemitter"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoptimizationremarkemitter/#aade146f3320cbbdbe3ae7685946fdb1d">MachineOptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoptimizationremarkemitter/#aade146f3320cbbdbe3ae7685946fdb1d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoptimizationremarkemitter/#aade146f3320cbbdbe3ae7685946fdb1d">MachineOptimizationRemarkEmitter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo">MachineBlockFrequencyInfo</a> &#42;MBFI)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">      : MF(MF), MBFI(MBFI) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Whether we allow for extra compile-time budget to perform more</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// analysis to be more informative.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is useful to enable additional missed optimizations to be reported</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that are normally too noisy.  In this mode, we can use the extra analysis</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (1) to filter trivial false positives or (2) to provide more context so</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that non-trivial false positives can be quickly detected by the user.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoptimizationremarkemitter/#a6a43a7e6e9af2d21b402eb6a76b25799"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoptimizationremarkemitter/#a6a43a7e6e9af2d21b402eb6a76b25799">allowExtraAnalysis</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86loweramxintrinsics-cpp/#adb9257105a403ef9d0773b87693f7779">PassName</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
